channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside Democrats' new push to handcuff ICE
item.description: Sen. Chris Murphy (D-Conn.) will propose sweeping reforms to DHS, including requiring a warrant for arrests, banning masks during enforcement operatio...

item.title: Senate votes to curb military action in Venezuela in rare Trump rebuke
item.description: The Senate on Thursday voted in favor of blocking President Trump from taking further military action in Venezuela without congressional approval afte...

item.title: Key airline used by Trump for deportations cuts ties with ICE
item.description: Avelo Airlines is cutting ties with ICE less than a year after inking a deal to carry out deportations for the agency. Why it matters: Avelo appears t...

item.title: Kennedy's nutrition guidelines raise questions
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s long-awaited rewrite of federal dietary guidelines may have raised as many questions as it answered. The big ...

item.title: Trump plans to make his ballroom addition as tall as the White House itself
item.description: The president’s architect disclosed the change as federal review panels begin a fast-track review of the $400 million project.

item.title: In combative news conference, Vance defends Minneapolis ICE shooting

item.title: Senate advances bill to block further military action in Venezuela
item.description: Though largely symbolic, the measure would be a rare assertion of Congress’s role in using lethal force after the stunning raid to capture Nicolás Mad...

item.title: Judge disqualifies U.S. attorney in Albany investigating Letitia James
item.description: John A. Sarcone III is the fifth Trump-appointed interim U.S. attorney who has been disqualified from serving in such a role.

item.title: Trump defends ICE, seeks to define shooting before facts are established
item.description: Trump seized on partial video footage to impose his interpretation of the shooting as investigators worked to establish the facts.

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
